name: TriangleArea
0:
”Alexa ask Triangle Area to Find the area of a triangle with sides three four and five.”
”Open Triangle Area What's the area of a triangle with sides eight nine and ten?”
”Ask Triangle Area sides are eight nine and ten.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: triangle area
des: Using Heron's formula this skill calculates the area of any triangle! Just ask "What is the area of a triangle with sides A, B and C?"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
